egl

Class GLBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • egl.GLBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisposable

    public class GLBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisposable
    Wrapper For An OpenGL Vertex Array Object And Multiple Buffer Objects
    Author:
    Cristian
